title: Assassinen Update - Rengar

embed.description: Showing off all the Rengar skins for his new update as part of the League of Legends Assassin Update Classic Rengar, Head Hunter Rengar, Night Hunter Rengar and SSW Rengar are included in the video. Check out the new preseason changes with all the assassin updates right here!

body:
Hello Riot team and community ,
I know that you doing a great job but there is one thing i want to discuss about. 
Like you all Know Rengar is a Lion but in the new update his pasive jump and ultimate doesnt even sound like a lion bec the sound is not deep loud and terryfing like it pls change this it is very important to me pls dont forget that he is a Lion

replies.body: Warum englisch? Du hast in vorherigen Diskussionen schon deutsch geschrieben? Außerdem ist Rengar erst am PBE. Das heißt im Spiel wird er wahrscheinlich wieder deine tollen Löwensounds haben. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
